Text:
Thank you. 

The small file size and lower video quality are fine for a news program. Actually I'm surprised at the very decent video quality considering the small file size. Kudos. 

On the rare occasion where I want to save an episode, or a specific segment of the show, I can simply download a higher res version.
Thank you so much for the upload, It's the only way I can watch KO. Video plays a bit wonky in Quicktime but plays fine in VLC. Anyway, really appreciate the upload.
Other versions (MP4's ~700MB and XviD/AVI's ~330MB) are available at demonoid, thanks to user olberfann.
